basics.name: Adam Romig
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am looking to fill a full-time role as a developer be it on the web, apps, or scripting.

highlights: Provide 2nd Level Support for customer PC & Mac desktops, laptops, and mobile devices.
Responsible for coordinating logistics of equipment deployment & inventory management for campus, remote offices, and home-based customers.
Created documentation for training team interns in standard processes.
Designed and maintain SQL databases for web apps, occasionally writing custom queries for management reports.
Utilized programming knowledge to drive process improvement through web applications & automation scripts.
Provided second level support to internal employees in regards to computer hardware issues.
Purchased printer supplies & reported total cost of ownership projections to management.
Purchased & managed inventory of computer equipment within the distribution center.
Developed a web application for streamlining PC acquisition and deployment.
Supports modifications & bug fixes for site and C# event scheduling app.
Added search functionality to discounts page.
Assisted with administration & moderation of forums to keep content family-friendly.
Utilized technical skills to troubleshoot script errors and create themes & graphics such as banners, logos, and contest awards.
